mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sepay.event (user_id, begin_date, end_date, title, todo, color, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{beginDate}, #{endDate}, #{title}, #{todo}, #{color}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM event WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY begin_date
mapper.update: UPDATE event SET begin_date = #{beginDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, title = #{title}, todo = #{todo}, color = #{color}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE event_no = #{eventNo}
